column1: '''Dervorin''' was the son of the Lord of the [[Ringló Vale]].

In the prelude of the [[Siege of Gondor]], [[Gondorian]] lords of the [[Outlands]] brought troops to [[Minas Tirith]] to aid in the defense of the City. Dervorin came to Minas Tirith on foot, leading three hundred men.<ref>{{RK
'''2001-2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]'':'''
:A Decipher card identifies one of the Gondorians of [[Minas Tirith]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' as Devorin.
